name: Flash want a coffee
description:
How to play

You can move with WASD or the arrow on the keyboard. Run on a NPC to kill him.

Trijam

This game was made for the Trijam #148. The theme was Inconvenient super powers.It was my very first game jam and I loved the experience. There was a 3 hour limit to play games but I went over and it took me a little over 4 hours to make. Even though I failed to make a game within the time limit, I wanted to share what I had done.

Idea

The idea for this game was to have a superhero who doesn't control his super speed. So I did Flash in a cafe that accidentally kills innocent people with its super speed. Policemen then arrive to stop Flash but avoiding the bullets he will kill others policeman.  

Art

I used the Tiny Bundle pack made by Vryell. All the visuals were taken in this pack. No art were made during the game jam. Go take a look at Vryell's work it's amazing!
